casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Clarence GILLIS. No. 320P03-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2007. Charles E. Reece, Assistant Attorney General, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The, following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of September 2007 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of December 2007."
